name: "Cursed" Bunny
description:
This is school project showcase not for commercial used. I do not owned any of the music and sound effect used in the game. Sounds Credit link: https://opengameart.org/content/evil-01 https://opengameart.org/contehttps://opengameart.org/content/game-over-bad-chest... https://opengameart.org/content/big-explosion https://opengameart.org/content/won-orchestral-winning-jingle https://opengameart.org/content/sfxshoot https://opengameart.org/content/sound-effects-sfx024 https://opengameart.org/content/plingy-coin https://opengameart.org/content/sound-way-nes-version https://opengameart.org/content/lava-splash Tools used: Photoshop and Construct 3 Game keys: Up down left right arrow to move and space to attack 

CatBossHead Hp 200 CatBossPaw100 each PlayerHp 70 GreenEyeBoss 50

Note: 

Traps around the screen does not do any damage is just there for visual scares

GreenEyeBoss Can only be killed using the "Bone-shaped" bullet
